titleStmt.title: The Lama-sabachthani, or, Cry of the Son of God useful at all times, especially for Passion Week, and at all other times for a devout and pious soul, in its nearest approaches and addresses to its Saviour, before and after it comes to be an actual partaker of the body and blood of its Redeemer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones, for Samuel Lowndes ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The Cry of the Son of God.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
